title: (x) Two fonts on shirts - Revue, Brush Stroke Fast {Akira, Mike F}
content:
Again, looking to ID some old fonts. Thanks for the help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [99-00 back logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/typophile.com/files/99-00%20back%20logo.jpg) | 400.3 KB |
| [99-00 front logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/typophile.com/files/99-00%20front%20logo.jpg) | 186.95 KB |

 [‹ (x) Manchester International Festival logo - custom designed by Paul Barnes {Kris Sowersby}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38095 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "To Hell With Gravity" Nike T-shirt - Futura {minimalista} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38120 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jeremy9107

comments.content: Correct. Any luck with the other one?
Thanks. Do you know where I can find this font? I am unable to locate it at fontfinder.com

Just in case you didn’t notice they had given you the links ... :^D

Brush Stroke Fast: [http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html "http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html")  
Revue: [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative\_alliance/revue/?sample\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044745/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/revue/?sample_text=INCLINE%20WRESTLING&sample_size=36 "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative\_alliance/revue/?sample\_text=INCLINE%20WRESTLING&sample\_size=36")
Yes, Tiffany, but there is no download for Brush Stroke Fast (as there once was, years ago). That’s why, Jeremy, I also linked to Pat Snyder’s much newer website - so that you could contact him.
